story: You come across a group of cyborgs, all equipped with advanced weaponry. One of them seems to be in distress and is pleading for help. What do you do?

actions.good: After analyzing their malfunction, you successfully repair the cyborg's systems. In gratitude, they offer you a rare and powerful cybernetic implant as a token of appreciation.
actions.bad: Your attempt to assist the distressed cyborg backfires, resulting in an accidental explosion that causes serious damage to both of you. The implant you were attempting to salvage is destroyed along with any possible loot.

actions.good: You continue on your way, leaving the cyborg to their own devices. In a surprising turn of events, they send word that they have located another valuable item that they would be willing to trade for your help.
actions.bad: As you disregard the pleas of the distressed cyborg, they become increasingly agitated and attack you. You take damage and are unable to escape with any loot.

actions.good: After a successful sneak attack, you steal an advanced cybernetic implant without being detected. The distressed cyborg is none the wiser and continues to plead for help.
actions.bad: Your attempt to rob the distressed cyborg results in their full wrath being unleashed upon you. You take heavy damage and are unable to escape with any loot.
